Title: Object: Orient Line to Egypt and Australia
Description: Postcard; printed paper; reproduces a poster advertising the P&O Orient Line between Egypt and Australia, with a pair of Western tourists and a local guide, each seated on a camel, in front of the Sphinx and Pyramids at Giza.
Producer name: Published by: Beric Tempest & Co Ltd
Associated names: Authorised or patronised by: Peninsular & Oriental Steam Navigation Co Ltd
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr St John Simpson
